official_title: A bill to amend the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956, as amended.

summary.text: Amends the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956 to authorize additional appropriations for assistance to non-Federal organizations for developing reclamation projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956, as amended.
